name: Octolost-MM16Version
description:
A lone octopus awakens alone and without memory, save for a fleeting voice in their mind. Take a journey across the shallows and discover what secrets lie in your journey ahead.

Made for Metroidvania Month 16

Code, Art - DragonDevDhot (DragonDevDhot - itch.io)

Music - Mike Byrne (AnAwfulLotOfCups - itch.io)

 (Music | AnAwfulLotOfCups (bandcamp.com))

SFX - Andrew Rocafort (crabbypops - itch.io)

This game features:

  • 2 areas to explore.
  • A variety of enemies.
  • 1 Boss.
  • Dogfish (that wants lots of pets)

Warning, end scene has a bright white flash, be advised.

Controls:

  • WASD to move.
  • Doubletap A or D to sidestep.
  • Space to jump.
  • E to interact.
  • F to heal.
  • Q for inventory/pause.
  • Esc to pause.
  • Shift to jet dash.
  • Left click to attack.
  • Right click to throw

* Couple of quick updates to fix some missed things, mainly improper room transitions and autoload issues.
